td.b: NOTIFICATION OF A NON-CITIZEN EMPLOYEE’S CESSATION OF

tr.td: This form is to be completed by the employer. You may wish to read the Explanatory Notes. It may take you up to 10 minutes to fill in this form if you have all relevant information such as your employee's employment records and income information for year of departure and the prior year, ready.

td.b: TYPE OF FORM IR21 (Please cross (x) where appropriate) – See Explanatory Note 6

tr.td: Additional, this is in addition to Form IR21 dated
Amended, this supersedes Form IR21 dated

td.span: Give reasons if less than one month’s notice is given to IRAS before employee’s cessation

tr.td: Amount of Monies Withheld Pending Tax Clearance
Are these all the monies you can withhold from the date of notification of resignation/termination/posting overseas? To provide reasons if “No” is checked.

tr.td: I, the undersigned, hereby give notice under Section 68 of the Income Tax Act, that the employee named in this form will cease to be employed and/or will probably leave Singapore on the date(s) stated. I also certify that the information given in this form and in any documents attached is true, correct and complete.
